name: Weebo's Basics (Abandoned Baldi's Basics 1.4.3 mod)
description:
NOTICE: THE FOLLOWING MOD WILL MOST LIKELY NEVER BE FINISHED. IF YOU WANT TO MAKE A REVIVAL OR A REMAKE OF THIS MOD, ASK PERMISSION FIRST.

This is Weebo's Basics, one of my oldest mods for Baldi's Basics. Keep in mind it's abandoned because it's not my proudest work, and it's pretty ugly to look at, for real though.

I only put this up in case anyone wants to play this unfinished mod of mine.

It's not really the best mod, I've ever made, there are some ugly-ass textures n' shit I put for this mod. So if you see some images that look pretty ugly, then don't say I didn't warn you.
